name: Dental treatments
about: Our dental services include teeth cleaning, whitening, fillings, and more.

name: Bones treatments
about: Our bone treatments include bone density testing, osteoporosis treatment, and fracture care.

name: Diagnosis
about: Our diagnosis services include medical tests, lab work, and imaging services to help diagnose various conditions.

name: Cardiology
about: Our cardiology services include diagnosis and treatment of heart conditions, as well as preventive care.

name: Surgery
about: Our surgery services include a wide range of surgical procedures, from minor to complex surgeries.

name: Eye care
about: Our eye care services include routine eye exams, disease management, and surgical procedures for vision correction.
